divs: Sighting DetailsSo i was looking out the window at around 5 6 am in the morning in ilkeston out my window i don't get full view off the stars im not sure witch star i was looking at but i was looking at a bright star then after 3 4 mins went past i saw a well what i can describe as a smaller star moving across to the left of the sky it wasn't in earths atmosphere it could of been a Asteroid but Then their was another star like object that i saw come from the left side heading towards the other object then the object from the right side just disapeard.and then i lost sight off the last object if it was a ufo it must of been 100miles long and speed of 2000mph atleast to travel that fast at that distance
trends: There have been no other sightings in Ilkeston
This sighting has never been favorited.
